name: Beefsteak Tomato
description: Large, meaty heirloom tomatoes. Requires staking and heavy sun.

name: Genovese Basil
description: The classic Italian basil. Repels pests and improves tomato flavor.

name: Danvers Carrot
description: Reliable orange root vegetable. Loves loose soil.

name: French Marigold
description: The 'Garden Guardian'. Protects neighbors from soil nematodes.

name: Apple
description: Requires pruning and pollinator variety for best yields.

name: Basil
description: Pinch flowers to extend leaf growth; attracts pollinators.

name: Beetroot
description: Thin seedlings to avoid overcrowding; sensitive to frost.

name: Borage
description: Attracts pollinators and beneficial insects.

name: Cabbage
description: Ensure crop rotation to prevent disease.

name: Carrot
description: Loose soil recommended for straight roots; thin seedlings.

name: Chives
description: Perennial; cut leaves to encourage growth.

name: Corn
description: Tall plants; avoid shading smaller crops.

name: Cucumber
description: Provide trellis support for vining varieties.

name: Garlic
description: Plant cloves with pointed side up; frost-hardy.

name: Kale
description: Cold-tolerant; harvest outer leaves first.

name: Lavender
description: Attracts pollinators; drought-tolerant.

name: Lettuce
description: Succession sowing extends harvest season; keep soil moist.

name: Cantaloupe
description: Require space for vines to spread.

name: Mint
description: Invasive; grow in pots to control spread.

name: Onion
description: Rotate crops to prevent disease; thin seedlings for bulb development.

name: Orange
description: Citrus trees prefer pots in cooler climates; frost sensitive.

name: Parsley
description: Biennial; can harvest leaves continuously.

name: Garden Pea
description: Supports soil nitrogen levels; trellis for climbing varieties.

name: Peach
description: Thin fruits to improve size; prune annually.

name: Bell Pepper
description: Warm-season crop; protect from frost.

name: Raspberry
description: Support canes with trellis; prune to encourage fruiting.

name: Rosemary
description: Drought-tolerant; prune to maintain shape.

name: Sage
description: Supports pollinators; drought-tolerant.

name: Spinach
description: Sensitive to heat; prefers cooler temperatures; fast-growing crop.

name: Strawberry
description: Mulch to retain moisture and prevent rot.

name: Sunflower
description: Tall plants; provide staking if needed.

name: Squash
description: Space plants to prevent disease; mulch to retain moisture.

name: Thyme
description: Drought-tolerant; attracts pollinators.

name: Tomato
description: Support with stakes or cages; prune suckers for better yield.

name: Watermelon
description: Vine plants; space accordingly.

name: Asparagus
description: Perennial crop; takes 2-3 years to establish before harvesting.

name: Brussels Sprouts
description: Cold-hardy; frost improves flavor; stake tall plants.

name: Cauliflower
description: Sensitive to temperature fluctuations; blanch curds to maintain white color.

name: Leek
description: Blanch stems by hilling soil; cold-hardy; slow growing.

name: Pumpkin
description: Needs lots of space; 'Three Sisters' companion planting with corn and beans.

name: Artichoke
description: Perennial in mild climates; pinch side buds for larger main buds.

name: Blueberry
description: Requires acidic soil pH 4.5-5.5; mulch with pine bark; cross-pollination improves yield.

name: Eggplant
description: Heat-loving plant; protect from cool temperatures; pinch suckers.

name: Fennel
description: Attracts beneficial insects; avoid near other Apiaceae family plants; self-seeding.

name: Okra
description: Heat and drought tolerant; harvest pods when young and tender.
